d.f: `農曆~`二十四節氣~`之~`一~，`屬~3`月~`節氣~。`參見~【`二十四節氣~】。

francais: Pure Lumière (une des 24 quinzaines de l'année solaire - début mars)
English: Qingming or Pure Brightness, 5th of the 24 solar terms `二十四節氣~|`二~`十~`四~节`气~[er4 shi2 si4 jie2 qi5] 5th-19th April
Pure Brightness Festival or Tomb Sweeping Day (in early April)
(of a government or administration) well ordered
